channel.title: Frisbee on Welcome
channel.description: Recent content in Frisbee on Welcome

item.title: Planning for the Offseason
item.description: One of my friends and teammates asked me for some feedback about what he should be working on during the frisbee off-season. I wrote him an email explaining about how I think about getting better in the off-season before sending him some personal feedback. I thought sending this email would help contextualize how I think about getting better and reaching our goals. Some of the information in here, can be applied to really any skill, not just getting better at frisbee.
